My co-author Johannes Urpelainen and I chatted with Andy Stone who runs the _Energy Policy Now_ podcast for the University of Pennsylvania's Kleinman Center. You can listen to us talk about energy policy for the 2020s [here](https://kleinmanenergy.upenn.edu/energy-policy-now).
